atprotoInfo.title: What is atproto?

shortVersion.heading: The short version
shortVersion.p1: AT Protocol (or atproto) is a protocol for creating decentralized social apps like the proto instant messenger and many more. Instead of one company owning your account, you choose a server (called a Personal Data Server, or PDS) to host your identity and data. That same account works across any app built on the protocol.
shortVersion.p2prefix: If you're coming from traditional social media, this is a fundamentally different approach.
shortVersion.p2suffix: explains how it works and why it matters.

ownIdentity.text: Your handle and data travel with you — switch apps or servers anytime.

noLockIn.text: Apps built on atproto can talk to each other. Your proto instant messenger buddies are the same people you follow on Bluesky.

openSource.text: Anyone can run a server or build an app. No gatekeepers.

createAccount.heading: Create an account
createAccount.text: To use proto instant messenger, you need an atproto account on any PDS. Some options:

atprotoInfo.disclaimer: proto instant messenger is not affiliated with any PDS provider. We are a community-run project building on the AT Protocol.
atprotoInfo.signInHint: Once you have an account, come back here and sign in with your handle (e.g. yourname.myatproto.social).

blacksky.name: blacksky.app
blacksky.description: A community-run PDS democratizing the protocol and building safe spaces. Please follow the rules and boundaries set up by their team. Run by Blacksky Algorithms.
blacksky.warning: This PDS is reserved for Black folks building communal infrastructure. Anyone else using a blacksky.app handle will receive a warning and then a suspension.

myatproto.name: myatproto.social and cryptoanarchy.network
myatproto.description: Blacksky Algorithms also operates PDSs that are open to anyone. These run on the same infrastructure as blacksky.app and are maintained by the same innovative team.
